mapper.select: select og.order_no orderNo, og.people people, og.order_date orderDate, og.delivery_m_adr deliveryMAdr, og.delivery_s_adr deliverySAdr, de.fee/og.people as pFee, biz.min_price minPrice from order_group og, delivery de, business biz where biz.store_no = og.store_no and biz.store_no = og.store_no and og.store_no = #{storeNo} order by order_date desc
